content: न्युब्ज {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Turned or bent downwards, lying on the face; ऊर्ध्वार्पितन्युब्जकटाहकल्पे (व्योम्नि) <ls>N. 22. 32.</ls> {@--2@} Bent, crooked. {@--3@} Convex. {@--4@} Hump-backed. --ब्जः {@--1@} The Nyagrodha tree. {@--2@} A kind of ladle made of Kuśa grass. --ब्जं A vessel used in Śrāddhas.
